description: Try our easy to follow Strawberry, Banana & Ricotta French Toast recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: French toast,Banana,Strawberry,High protein,Seafood free,Christmas,Quick & easy breakfast,Mar 2020,Sesame free
name: Strawberry, Banana & Ricotta French Toast Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly whisk eggs, milk, half the maple syrup and cinnamon in a large, wide, shallow bowl. Spread bread with ricotta. Top 4 bread slices with strawberries and banana, then sandwich with remaining bread.
Dip each sandwich into egg mixture, turning to soak both sides.

Heat a medium, non-stick frying pan over medium-low heat. Add half the margarine, swirling pan to coat. When margarine starts to foam, add 2 sandwiches to pan and cook for 3-4 minutes or until golden, then turn and cook for a further for 2-3 minutes or until golden. Remove from pan and cut in half. Repeat with remaining sandwiches. Drizzle over remaining syrup and serve with extra strawberries and mint.
